code: import"./navbar.scss";import HomeOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/HomeOutlined";import DarkModeOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/DarkModeOutlined";import WbSunnyOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/WbSunnyOutlined";import GridViewOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/GridViewOutlined";import NotificationsOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/NotificationsOutlined";import EmailOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/EmailOutlined";import PersonOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/PersonOutlined";import SearchOutlinedIcon from"@mui/icons-material/SearchOutlined";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useContext}from"react";import{DarkModeContext}from"../../context/darkModeContext";import{AuthContext}from"../../context/authContext";import{usePosts}from"../../context/PostsContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{toggle,darkMode}=useContext(DarkModeContext);const{currentUser}=useContext(AuthContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"theme_color",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"SocialPost"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"theme_color",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeOutlinedIcon,{})}),darkMode?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WbSunnyOutlinedIcon,{onClick:toggle}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DarkModeOutlinedIcon,{onClick:toggle})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile/".concat(currentUser.id),className:"theme_color",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PersonOutlinedIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:currentUser.name})})]})]});};export default Navbar;
